text: The 1988 season was Molde's 14th season in the top flight of Norwegian football. This season Molde competed in 1. divisjon (first tier), the Norwegian Cup and the 1988–89 UEFA Cup. In the league, Molde finished in 3rd position, 8 points behind winners Rosenborg. Molde participated in the 1988 Norwegian Cup. They reached the quarter-finals where they drew rivals Rosenborg. Molde lost the game at Molde Stadion 1–2 after extra time and were eliminated from the competition. ==Squad== Source: ==Friendlies== ==Competitions== ===1. divisjon=== ==== Results summary ==== ====Positions by round==== ====Results==== ====League table==== ===Norwegian Cup=== ===UEFA Cup=== ==Squad statistics== ===Appearances and goals=== Lacking information: *Appearance statistics (8–10 players) and goalscorer from Norwegian Cup quarter-finals are missing. |} ===Goalscorers=== {| class="wikitable" style="font-size: 95%; text-align: center;" |- !width=60|Rank !width=60|Position !width=60| !width=150|Player !width=80|1. divisjon !width=80|Norwegian Cup !width=80|UEFA Cup !width=80|Total |- |rowspan="2"|1 || FW || || Jostein Flo || 10 || 4 || 0 || 14 |- || MF || || Kjetil Rekdal || 10 || 3 || 1 || 14 |- |3 || FW || || Øystein Neerland || 6 || 0 || 0 || 6 |- |4 || DF || || Ole Erik Stavrum || 4 || 0 || 0 || 4 |- |rowspan="2"|5 || MF || || Ronald Wenaas || 2 || 0 || 0 || 2 |- || MF || || Jan Berg || 1 || 1 || 0 || 2 |- |rowspan="2"|7 || MF || || Torbjørn Evensen || 1 || 0 || 0 || 1 |- || FW || || Rune Sunde || 1 || 0 || 0 || 1 |- | colspan="3"| | Unknown || 0 || 1 || 0 || 1 |- | colspan="3"| |TOTALS |35 || 9 || 1 || 45 |} ==See also== *Molde FK seasons == References == == External links== *nifs.no 1988 Molde
